name: Last Commit
tag_list: web-applications, hiring, video-search, designers, developers, online-video
overview:
Last Commit, LLC is a company focused on building web applications that fill a variety of needs.

Last Commit was started by a designer/developer team who worked extensively in the San Francisco Bay Area tech industry. After working with a variety of companies and startups for over eight years, they decided to focus their work on their own products. Taking no outside funding, the founders have bootstrapped their web applications from the ground up.

Last Commit has launched two web applications, NinjasAndRockstars.com and WatchItStream.com. These sites are attempts to solve two different problems–hiring designers and developer in the Bay Area and finding the best place to watch movies and tv on the internet, respectively. The Last Commit sites are design-focused efforts that take a different problem solving approach than other competing applications.
